languages.text: "Я не знал{mf||а}, что камень подавит вашу силу. Обещаю, мы найдем способ избавить вас от сего артефакта".

traits.locale_text: "Я не знал{mf||а}, что камень подавит вашу силу. Обещаю, мы найдем способ избавить вас от сего артефакта".

languages.text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."
languages.original_text: "Я не знал{mf||а}, что камень подавит вашу силу. Обещаю, мы найдем способ избавить вас от сего артефакта".

traits.locale_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you from it, I promise."
"I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you from it, I promise."
"I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."
"I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."
"I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

languages.text: “我不知道那块石头会压制你的力量。我们会找到办法弄掉那块石头的，我保证。”
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道那块石头会压制你的力量。我们会找到办法弄掉那块石头的，我保证。”

languages.text: «No sabía que la piedra contendría su poder. Encontraremos una forma de librarla de ella, lo prometo».
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: «No sabía que la piedra contendría su poder. Encontraremos una forma de librarla de ella, lo prometo».

languages.text: 「この石がカシアの力を抑えているとは知らなかった。取り除く方法を見つけてみる、任せてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: 「この石がカシアの力を抑えているとは知らなかった。取り除く方法を探そう、任せてくれ」
「この石がカシアの力を抑えているとは知らなかった。取り除く方法を見つけてみる、任せてくれ」

languages.text: « Je ne savais pas que la pierre briderait vos pouvoirs. Nous trouverons un moyen de vous en libérer, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne savais pas que la pierre briderait vos pouvoirs. Nous trouverons un moyen de vous en libérer, je vous le promets. »

languages.text: "Ich wusste nicht, dass der Stein Eure Kräfte unterdrücken würde. Wir werden einen Weg finden, Euch davon zu befreien, das verspreche ich."
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste nicht, dass der Stein Eure Kräfte unterdrücken würde. Wir werden einen Weg finden, Euch davon zu befreien, das verspreche ich."

languages.text: "Taşın, sahip olduğun güçleri bastıracağını bilmiyordum. Ondan kurtulmanın yolunu bulacağız, sana söz."
languages.original_text: "I did not know the stone would suppress your power. We will find a way to rid you of it, I promise."

traits.locale_text: "Taşın, sahip olduğun güçleri bastıracağını bilmiyordum. Ondan kurtulmanın yolunu bulacağız, sana söz."
